name: Unitronics Comunicaciones
overview: Unitronics Comunicaciones, S.A. provides information and communications technology services for business organizations, public institutions, and telecommunications operators. The company provides infrastructure network services for IP multiservice networks; LAN, WAN, and MAN networks; broadband networks; optical networks; wireless networks; corporate remote access systems; and virtual private networks. Its Information Systems services include email, messaging, and directory services; server consolidation; storage; data protection; business continuity; infrastructure and services management; and thin client architectures. Unitronicsâ€™ Unified Communications solutions include IP telephony and IP contact centers; individual and group videoconferencing; entertainment networks; video-surveillance networks; conference infrastructures; video-telephony; audio conferencing; conference recording and broadcast; presence, messaging, and collaboration systems; and projects for halls and auditoriums. The companyâ€™s security solutions include perimeter and internal segments protection; unified threat management; secure remote access; security on the Intranet; optimization of infrastructures; content delivery networks; detection and treatment of vulnerabilities; and security event management. Its customers include universities, hospitals, governments, public administration, banking and insurances, utilities, and media.
